programme.title: Rick Stein's Mediterranean Escapes
programme.desc: Rick Stein discovers sausages and sheep's cheese and explores the locals' passion for chestnuts in Corsica.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Mediterranean Escapes
programme.desc: On a misty lagoon in Sardinia Rick watches the fishermen catch mullet using the same methods as the Romans did centuries before. He boards a ferry for Sicily to find, in the heart of Palermo, one of the best pasta dishes he's ever tasted.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Mediterranean Escapes
programme.desc: Rick travels from Sicily to Puglia.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Mediterranean Escapes
programme.desc: Rick travels from Sicily to Puglia.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Mediterranean Escapes
programme.desc: Departing from Italy and on to Corfu.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Mediterranean Escapes
programme.desc: In Mallorca, Rick finds wonderful seafood dishes and the most succulent roast lamb he's ever tasted, while in Barcelona he samples Catalonian food at the famous Boqueria market.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Mediterranean Escapes
programme.desc: Rick samples the delights of couscous, tagines and mint tea in Moroccan bazaars, before heading along the old silk route to south-eastern Turkey, where he tastes the finest kebabs.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Secret France
programme.desc: Rick Stein embarks on a new journey through the byways of France, from the Channel to the Mediterranean, always on the look out for things where the British could learn from the French to enhance lives.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Secret France
programme.desc: Rick Stein's goes through France's eastern border regions of Alsace and Jura home to his favourite French dish, choucroute garni and favorite French cheese, comté.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Secret France
programme.desc: Rick Stein's goes through France's eastern border regions of Alsace and Jura home to his favourite French dish, choucroute garni and favorite French cheese, comté.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Secret France
programme.desc: Rick Stein continues exploring Burgundy and practices a little entente cordiale with a chateau owner who cooks him sorrel soup straight out of the garden.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Secret France
programme.desc: Rick Stein arrives in the region of Perigord, famous for decadent dishes; he discovers his favorite market in the city of Perigueux and learns about the region's historical relationship with England as the former kingdom of Aquitaine.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Secret France
programme.desc: Rick Stein's journey of discovery brings him to the sunnier climes of the Mediterranean, where he explores the French-Catalan legacy of Roussilon on the foothills of the Pyrenees next to the Spanish border.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Secret France
programme.desc: Rick Stein approaches the end of his meander through France with a final glance at the culinary delights of the Languedoc before crossing over to Provence and the Mediterranean coastline that reveals new insights into southern French cuisine.

programme.desc: Rick Stein discovers sausages and sheep's cheese and explores the locals' passion for chestnuts in Corsica.

programme.title: Nigellissima
programme.desc: Nigella introduces her love of Italian food through a spectacular yet simple Sicilian pasta with tomatoes, garlic and almonds, and a mid-week family feast of tagliata.

programme.title: Nigellissima
programme.desc: Nigella Lawson shares the secrets of her Italian roast chicken, served alongside a saffron orzotto; Nigella prepares coffee ice cream for dessert, inspired by the ice cream parlors of Florence; a chocolate olive oil cake provides an extra treat.

programme.title: Nigellissima
programme.desc: Pork loin stuffed with Parma ham and oregano, served alongside her speedy mock mash and lazy person's vignarola.

programme.title: Nigellissima
programme.desc: Liquorice pudding; Sardinian sun-dried and toasted couscous; butterflied leg of lamb; baby aubergines with oregano and roasted red onion.

programme.title: Nigellissima
programme.desc: Nigella starts with her take on a light and sunny yogurt pot cake; she recruits her niece and nephew to make a shortcut sausage meatball supper; Nigella prepares squid and prawns with marjoram and chili; a tiramisini ends the evening.

programme.title: La caída de El Chapo
programme.desc: Asesino, traficante de drogas, héroe popular, Houdini de escapes - la leyenda de Joaquín "El Chapo" Guzmán es bien conocida. Este especial revela una mirada sin precedentes al hombre detrás del mito y cómo sus carteles nos afectan en casa.

programme.title: El precio de la historia
programme.desc: Los chicos de la tienda tienen la oportunidad de comprar un antiguo cofre de tesoros que nadie puede abrir, aunque lo que tenga dentro podría hacer la diferencia.
programme.category: Temporada 1 Episodio 17 - El cofre del tesoro

programme.title: El precio de la historia
programme.desc: Los chicos quieren comprar una hélice de avión que puede estar vinculada históricamente a Charles Lindbergh. ¿Podrán encontrar un experto o documentación que confirme el vínculo o este acuerdo fracasará?

programme.title: El precio de la historia
programme.desc: Un clásico coche de carreras Shelby de 1965. Un reloj de barco de la época de la Segunda Guerra Mundial podría no funcionar. Una colección de dientes de megalodón.
programme.category: Temporada 1 Episodio 16 - El reloj y la cobra

programme.title: ¿Quién da má$?
programme.desc: En la subasta de Riverside, Brandi decide presentarse vestida de forma llamativa para atraer todas las miradas y distraer a la competencia. ¿Funcionará? Más tarde, René podría apostar por más de lo que es capaz de manejar.

programme.title: Superbombas
programme.desc: Una nueva carrera armamentística está en marcha y las potencias mundiales están desarrollando bombas de destrucción masiva. Este especial se meterá en el Pentágono y en las pruebas militares para descubrir estas nuevas armas devastadoras.

programme.title: La evidencia está entre nosotros
programme.desc: El periodista Tony Harris y su equipo de expertos analizan las evidencias de la existencia de naves submarinas, de origen desconocido.
programme.category: Temporada 4 Episodio 5 - Edición alienígena: OVNIs en el mar

programme.title: Triángulo de las Bermudas: aguas malditas
programme.desc: El equipo investiga lo que podrían ser los restos del Marine Sulphur Queen, un barco perdido en 1963 con treinta y nueve tripulantes. Es uno de los naufragios más emblemáticos del Triángulo de las Bermudas.

programme.title: Inexplicable Latinoámerica con Humberto Zurita
programme.desc: Una actriz con tumores inexplicables mejora después de una experiencia extracorpórea y una niña conectada a un respirador artificial sobrevive. Humberto muestra enigmas que plantean la influencia de factores desconocidos en la curación.

programme.title: La evidencia está entre nosotros
programme.desc: Tony y sus expertos examinan el video de un supuesto Ironman sobrevolando los cielos de la ciudad de Los Ángeles.
programme.category: Temporada 2 Episodio 9 - El hombre volador y el huevo alienígena del océano

programme.title: El secreto de Skinwalker
programme.desc: El equipo se entera de que su investigación puede resultar clave para la vigilancia de la comunidad y decide compartir sus descubrimientos con el Fiscal General de Utah con la esperanza de poder continuar con su trabajo.

programme.title: El precio de la historia en la carretera
programme.desc: Rick, Corey y Chum terminan su viaje por carretera en Winston-Salem, Carolina del Norte, la ciudad natal de Richard, donde esperan hacer buenos tratos.

programme.title: Lo mejor de El precio de la historia
programme.desc: Una serie de artículos de los criminales más peligrosos llega a la tienda. Pero ahora, Rick y el equipo deben decidir si vale pena atraparlos o si prefieren dejarlos libres.

programme.title: Gigantes de los juguetes
programme.desc: Santa Claus es una de las figuras más queridas y famosas de la Tierra. ¿Cómo fue que este santo del siglo III, se convirtió en el Santa que conocemos hoy?
programme.category: Temporada 3 Episodio 22 - El Santa que Norteamérica construyó

programme.title: Mitos: los grandes misterios de la humanidad
programme.desc: Según Platón, Atlantis era un imperio de arquitectura fascinante e impresionante poder militar que desapareció hace más de 2500 años en medio de una catástrofe.

programme.title: Inexplicable Latinoámerica con Humberto Zurita
programme.desc: Existen construcciones que tienen algo que decir. En un hotel de Argentina habita el espectro de una niña. San Pablo sufre una maldición con el número 13. OVNIs contactan a un hombre y esto lleva a construir un impresionante Ovnipuerto.

programme.title: Grandes escapes con Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: Rene Belbenoit, un ladrón de poca monta ,es sentenciado a trabajos forzados en la infame colonia penal, ubicada en la Guayana Francesa. Tras muchos años y numerosas fugas frustradas, finalmente obtiene su libertad.
programme.category: Temporada 2 Episodio 16 - Escape de la isla del Diablo

programme.title: Crónicas de prisión
programme.desc: Andersonville es el último lugar al que un soldado de la Unión querría ir, durante la Guerra Civil norteamericana, ya que allí murieron doce mil hombres. Dorence Atwater creó unalista secreta crucial para marcar las tumbas.

programme.title: Crónicas de prisión
programme.desc: Durante un siglo, Francia envió sus prisioneros a la Isla del Diablo. Desde una viuda infame, hasta Alfred Dreyfus, fueron condenados por crímenes que no cometieron. La isla es famosa por su temida guillotina: La Viuda Alegre.
programme.category: Temporada 1 Episodio 5 - La isla del diablo

programme.title: Reyes del crimen
programme.desc: Tres carteles dominan el negocio de la droga en México hasta la llegada de un líder maquíavelico que querrá dominarlo todo.

programme.title: Más allá de Skinwalker
programme.desc: Los investigadores Andy Bustamante y Paul Beban se asocian con un grupo de Rangers Navajos.

programme.title: Los expedientes secretos
programme.desc: En el año 2004, en Campeche, un avión de la Fuerza Aérea que patrullaba la costa detectó una serie de OVNIS en sus radares. Esto desencadenó una intensa investigación que resultó ser el primer caso oficial desclasificado de México.
programme.category: Temporada 1 Episodio 1 - No estamos solos: el caso Campeche

programme.title: Archivos secretos del Vaticano: el Papa y el diablo
programme.desc: El silencio puede significar complicidad, o un arma para combatir a alguien en secreto. A Pío XII se le ha llamado el Papa del Silencio por su relación con Hitler. ¿Qué tipo de silencio? ¿Pío XII fué cómplice o adversario del Führer?
programme.category: Temporada 1 Episodio 4 - Un nuevo demonio se acerca

programme.title: Increíble con Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: Repasamos la lista de armas más escandalosas y extrañas jamás vistas: desde tanques inflables y robots asesinos, hasta vehículos Vespas reconvertidos en bazucas y controversiales delfines de guerra.

programme.title: El libro perdido de Nostradamus
programme.desc: Una periodista italiana se tropezó con un manuscrito inusual titulado Nostradamus: estaba firmado por Michel de Notredame, el profeta Nostradamus, y contenía ilustraciones hechas por el mismo autor.

programme.title: Grandes escapes con Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: El Chapo es uno de los capos de los cárteles de la droga más notorios y asesinos de la historia moderna. Sus audaces fugas de prisiones de máxima seguridad en México son motivo de leyenda.

programme.title: Crónicas de prisión
programme.desc: Alcatraz fue construida para albergar lo peor de lo peor. Conocemos las tres historias de los hombres dispuestos a a todo, para poder escapar de la Roca.

programme.title: Crónicas de prisión
programme.desc: Attica tiene una historia de violencia y abuso de prisioneros, que se extiendió durante décadas. Desde el degollamiento del asesino en serie, Son of Sam, hasta el único escape exitoso del mafioso irlandés, Mad Dog Sullivan.

programme.title: Crónicas de la mafia
programme.desc: Pablo Escobar condujo el más violento mandato del Cártel de Medellín, quien luego se convirtió en el traficante de cocaína más poderoso del mundo.
programme.category: Temporada 1 Episodio 3 - El cartel de Medellín

programme.title: Crónicas de la mafia
programme.desc: La Hermandad Aria, también conocida como AB, es la pandilla carcelaria más mortal de Estados Unidos. Fue fundada como una asociación ilícita exclusiva para hombres blancos.

programme.title: La caída de El Chapo
programme.desc: Asesino, traficante de drogas, héroe popular, Houdini de escapes - la leyenda de Joaquín "El Chapo" Guzmán es bien conocida. Este especial revela una mirada sin precedentes al hombre detrás del mito y cómo sus carteles nos afectan en casa.

programme.title: Grandes escapes con Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: Durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial, un grupo de prisioneros aliados utilizó todo tipo de falsificaciones y tácticas de ingeniería para escapar de un campo de prisioneros de guerra alemán.

programme.title: Grandes escapes con Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: Durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial, un grupo de prisioneros aliados utilizó todo tipo de falsificaciones y tácticas de ingeniería para escapar de un campo de prisioneros de guerra alemán.

programme.title: El precio de la historia
programme.desc: Un clásico coche de carreras Shelby de 1965. Un reloj de barco de la época de la Segunda Guerra Mundial podría no funcionar. Una colección de dientes de megalodón.
programme.category: Temporada 1 Episodio 16 - El reloj y la cobra

programme.title: El precio de la historia
programme.desc: Corey compra un globo de aire caliente para 12 personas a un precio bastánte alto. Un hombre intenta venderles su guitarra Gibson Les Paul de 1960 y otro les lleva una botella de Whiskey medicinal de la época de la prohibición.

programme.title: ¿Quién da má$?
programme.desc: En Lancaster, un pequeño animal toma por sorpresa a Lisa, pero aun así logra quedarse con el premio. Más tarde, Ivy e Isaiah trabajan duro para vaciar un contenedor y quedan con ganas de beber algo.

programme.title: Alienígenas ancestrales
programme.desc: Los científicos han descubierto que junto al Homo Sapiens, convivieron otras siete especies similares a los humanos. ¿Por qué solo los humanos sobrevivimos? ¿Es posible que fuéramos producto de experimentación extraterrestre?

programme.title: ¿Qué salió mal?
programme.desc: Cuando un Boeing 777 se estrella en el aeropuerto de San Francisco sin previo aviso, los ingenieros recurren a otros desastres para descifrar lo que pasó.

programme.title: ¿Quién da má$?
programme.desc: Kenny llega a California y siente que está de vacaciones por Europa. ¿Podrá obtener buenos resultados? Mientras tanto, Jarrod se frustra con un casillero poco prometedor.
programme.category: Temporada 13 Episodio 8 - Kenny oh la la!

programme.title: ¿Quién da má$?
programme.desc: Ivy lleva a su hijo a conocer Moreno Valley y juntos obtienen una recompensa inesperada de yo-yos. Más tarde, Rene y Casey descubren que sus tenis tienen más de "air" que de "Jordan".

programme.title: Amos del pantano
programme.desc: La gente del pantano lidia con la ola de calor. Mientras, Pickle pone a prueba su cebo especial congelado. Por su parte, los Edgars apuestan por aguas más frías.

programme.title: Restauraciones secretas
programme.desc: Una mujer busca la ayuda de Alfred, para sorprender a su esposo con una guitarra clásica Fender Mustang. Más tarde, Dave hace su magia metálica en una estufa de hierro fundido. Sara le devuelve el brillo a un viejo escritorio.
programme.category: Temporada 1 Episodio 8 - Rock & Roll en llamas

programme.title: El precio de la historia
programme.desc: Corey intenta quedarse con un sillón de dentista antiguo. Más tarde, alguien llega con un un póster de Superman hecho por Andy Warhol. Además, Rick y Chum dan una vuelta en un Cadillac Coupe DeVille del '64.

programme.title: Grandes misterios de la historia
programme.desc: Por primera vez, el buque de investigación más avanzado del mundo sigue las pistas de la desaparición más famosa del Triángulo de las Bermudas: el Vuelo 19 que, en 1945 mientras buscaba a cinco torpederos, desapareció sin dejar rastro.
programme.category: Temporada 2 Episodio 1 - Expedición al Triángulo de las Bermudas

programme.title: Enigmas de la historia
programme.desc: El Triángulo de las Bermudas es famoso por desapariciones misteriosas de barcos, aviones y personas desde el siglo XIX. Si bien hay teorías sobrenaturales y ambientales, los investigadores se preguntan cómo suceden estas desapariciones.
programme.category: Temporada 1 Episodio 8 - El triángulo de las Bermudas

programme.title: Gigantes de la ingeniería
programme.desc: Francia y Estados Unidos compiten para construir un camino que conecte los océanos Atlántico y Pacífico. Llevarlo a cabo se cobrará más de 30 mil vidas, costará 600 millones de dólares y requerirá superar obstáculos imaginables.
programme.category: Temporada 1 Episodio 4 - El canal de Panamá

programme.title: Archivos alienígenas: reabiertos
programme.desc: Un hombre descubrió un laboratorio subterráneo pero fue engañado por la Fuerza Aérea y otro afirmó ver alienígenas y humanos, pero murió. Los investigadores se preguntan si existen casos de desinformación o verdades tapadas con mentiras.

programme.title: Inexplicable
programme.desc: Durante siglos, la humanidad ha mirado a la Luna con asombro. Los expertos se preguntan si la Luna es solo una roca que flota en el espacio o si guarda secretos profundos y si quizás incluso posee poderes increíbles.
programme.category: Temporada 2 Episodio 17 - El lado oscuro de la Luna

programme.title: Grandes misterios de la historia
programme.desc: Tras siglos de avistamientos y búsquedas infructuosas, uno de los monstruos más infames del planeta sigue sin ser identificado. Y aunque las pruebas continúan acumulándose, el misterio sigue sin ser descifrado.
programme.category: Temporada 4 Episodio 1 - El monstruo del Lago Ness

programme.title: ¡Alto! Frontera
programme.desc: En el aeropuerto de Lima los servicios de inteligencia reportan sobre unos pasajeros sospechosos de pertenecer a una red criminal y los oficiales logran atraparlos.

programme.title: ¡Alto! Frontera
programme.desc: Un pasajero colombiano con destino a Madrid es perfilado por agentes de seguridad aeroportuarios. Luego de ser interrogado deciden hacer una revisión. Al revisar su equipaje la policía se encontró con paquetes de café con cocaína.

programme.title: Testigo de la historia
programme.desc: Theo viaja a Stalingrado, en 1942. Allí intentará descubrir cómo el desvalido ejército soviético consiguió una victoria que cambió el rumbo de la guerra a favor de las fuerzas aliadas.

programme.title: Testigo de la historia
programme.desc: Theo Wilson viaja en el tiempo a los años 60 llenos de tensión para ver cómo el inspirador héroe de los derechos civiles, John Lewis, lideró una marcha histórica a través del puente Edmund Pettus el Domingo Sangriento.

programme.title: Derrochadores ancestrales
programme.desc: Mostramos las asombrosas sumas que llegaron a gastar estos sibaritas en la búsqueda de las comidas y bebidas más raras, deliciosas y prohibidas que el dinero podía comprar.

programme.title: Derrochadores ancestrales
programme.desc: Los monarcas y millonarios que gastaron sus fortunas coleccionando animales salvajes.

programme.title: War Gamers: Mujeres en la 2da guerra
programme.desc: Gran Bretaña decide tomar parte en la segunda guerra mundial contra Alemania, la Marina Real Británica busca desesperadamente una manera de hundir los submarinos alemanes para evitar que corten sus vitales rutas de transporte.

programme.title: Inexplicable Latinoámerica con Humberto Zurita
programme.desc: La selva Amazónica contiene innumerables misterios ocultos. Un explorador encuentra un manuscrito que describe una ciudad perdida. Un científico descubre un río hirviente en Perú, desafiando las certezas científicas.

programme.title: Embajadores de la mafia
programme.desc: La historia de Meyer Lansky, oriundo de Bielorusia, quien de joven conoció a Bugsy Siegel y manejaban pandillas en Manhattan, era destacado lavando dinero. Él junto a Batista hicieron de Cuba un gran burdel y centro de apuestas mundial.

programme.title: Grandes escapes con Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: James Earl Ray, el asesino confeso de Martin Luther King, fue un notorio artista del escape. Su intento más audaz y reconocido consistió en fabricar una escalera hecha de tubos de plomería para pasar por encima del muro de la prisión.
programme.category: Temporada 1 Episodio 8 - El vuelo del asesino

programme.title: Derrochadores ancestrales
programme.desc: Mostramos las asombrosas sumas que llegaron a gastar estos sibaritas en la búsqueda de las comidas y bebidas más raras, deliciosas y prohibidas que el dinero podía comprar.

programme.title: Derrochadores ancestrales
programme.desc: Los monarcas y millonarios que gastaron sus fortunas coleccionando animales salvajes.

programme.title: Grandes misterios de la historia
programme.desc: Impresionantes y misteriosas, las pirámides de Egipto están entre las maravillas más significativas del mundo antiguo. Con más de 4 mil años de antigüedad, aún nadie entiende completamente cómo fueron construidas o por qué.
programme.category: Temporada 4 Episodio 10 - Las enigmáticas pirámides de Egipto

programme.title: Reyes del crimen
programme.desc: En Colombia, en 1970, el tráfico de cocaína es a pequeña escala. Pero un ladrón de poca monta creará el primer cartel global bajo un reino de terror.

programme.title: Crónicas de la mafia
programme.desc: Los Hells Angels y su controversial líder, Sonny Barger, iniciaron las pandillas motoqueras, un modelo sangriento de comunidad, que más tarde fue replicado por muchos otros grupos de motociclistas fuera de la ley.
programme.category: Temporada 1 Episodio 4 - Hells Angels: los años de Sonny Barger

programme.title: Crónicas de la mafia
programme.desc: Los Bloods y los Crips protagonizaron una de las rivalidades más violentas en la historia de las pandillas callejeras de los Estados Unidos. Ambas pandillas fueron fundadas en Los Ángeles, en los años setenta.

programme.title: Las cinco familias: capos de la mafia
programme.desc: Narramos el ascenso de la mafia norteamericana desde los barrios de Nueva York durante la época de prohibición, su auge en la década de los años cincuenta y su declive tras transcurrir un periodo de violencia, drogas y audiencias.
programme.category: Temporada 1 Episodio 1 - Muerte de las viejas reglas

programme.title: Crónicas de prisión
programme.desc: La Torre de Londres es famosa por su reputación de torturas y decapitaciones. Aquí, la reina Ana Bolena se enfrentó a la espada del verdugo.
programme.category: Temporada 1 Episodio 9 - La torre de Londres

programme.title: Crónicas de prisión
programme.desc: Andersonville es el último lugar al que un soldado de la Unión querría ir, durante la Guerra Civil norteamericana, ya que allí murieron doce mil hombres. Dorence Atwater creó unalista secreta crucial para marcar las tumbas.

programme.title: Henry Danger: The Movie
programme.desc: After Henry Danger meets a superfan who's eager to fight crime with Kid Danger, they come into possession of a device that can open alternate realities and Henry needs his best friend Jasper and his new superfan sidekick to find his way out.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler is left with little choice but to force Joey into a sleeping clinic after his roommate's snoring problem becomes too much for him to handle; Monica feels reluctant to remove a wedding dress that she has tried on for Emily.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross and Emily go over the guest list for their upcoming wedding ceremony and neither can agree on whether to invite Rachel; the gang discusses Ross and Rachel's history together before Monica gives her roommate a shoulder to cry upon.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe expresses frustration towards the daily grind of being emotionally imbalanced and pregnant; Ross makes the mistake of choosing Joey as his best man when his foolhardy friend throws an outlandish bachelor party that ends badly.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The gang heads across the Atlantic Ocean in order to attend Ross's wedding to Emily; Joey drives Chandler crazy by purchasing a ridiculous-looking hat in London; Rachel works up the courage in order to attend the wedding ceremony.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel decides to crash Ross' big wedding day in order to interrupt the proceedings before they can go any further; Joey finds that he misses his home; after drinking too much, Monica and Chandler wind up sleeping together.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross attempts to convince Emily to accompany him on their already-planned honeymoon vacation, but the woman's failure to show on time leads him to invite Rachel so the tickets won't go to waste; mayhem ensues when Emily arrives to see Rachel.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler makes the mistake of planting a kiss on Monica in front of the other girls, whom he is now forced to smooch in order to cover up his very public gaffe; Rachel works up the courage to reveal her romantic feelings for Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe decides to ask her brother and sister-in-law to keep one of the triplets when they are born; Rachel tries to set Monica up on a date with an attractive male nurse; Joey believes that his pains are in sympathy of Phoebe's.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon surprises Amy by sharing a secret with her about his old laptop computer; Koothrappali reveals to Penny and Bernadette that Leonard and Wolowitz lied to them so that they could go see the early screening of a movie.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon, Amy, Leonard and Penny spend their weekend at a cabin, where Sheldon reveals one of Leonard's secrets; Koothrappali purchases an overwhelming amount of gifts for Wolowitz and Bernadette's unborn child, leading them to draw the line.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: After Leonard and Sheldon blow a small argument out of proportion during a group get-together, they each force their friends to choose which one they will spend their time with; Raj complains to Howard about the struggle of dating two women.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The gang comes across Penny's ex-boyfriend, Zack, while visiting a wine bar; Bernadette is forced to spend her evening with Sheldon since she is unable to go to the wine tasting; Koothrappali introduces his new girlfriend to the group.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey believes that he is being offered a hosting gig for a PBS telethon, but it turns out that he is only wanted as a pledge-taker; Phoebe accidentally donates money to PBS while trying to perform a selfless deed and earn good karma.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler plan for a weekend-long tryst together and swear Joey to secrecy when he discovers their secret relationship; Ross is forced to cut Rachel out of his life if he still desires to have Emily back as his loving wife.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire hates how the neighbors' yard looks with their hideous boat parked on it, so Phil makes a strike against them, which soon escalates to a battle between the homes; Jay struggles to potty train Joe; Cam takes Lily to clown school.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: When Phil realizes that Luke is hitting his teenage phase of shutting him out, he employs Andy to be his new top assistant; Gloria and the doctors worry that Joe may be allergic to Stella; Mitchell does some side work at Jay's closet company.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: As Valentine's Day approaches, Claire worries that Phil has more feelings for "Juliana" than for her; Jay is upset when Gloria's sister pays them a visit, which halts their romantic plans; Mitchell and Cameron get stuck in an unpredictable situation.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: After spending a weekend with Phil's old pals, Claire grabs the last first class seat available on their flight home, leaving Phil stuck in coach; Gloria gets Jay to help Manny protect himself against a bully; the group throws Sal a baby shower.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire gets stranded at the airport, and goes to great lengths to get in touch with Haley after they had a huge argument; Claire video calls the family to help find her and snoops through the internet, which ends up with everyone in on the mayhem.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Jay and Claire butt heads over how to make a Pritchett Closets commercial; Phil, Luke and Manny plan to stop a neighbor who is using a robot drone to spy on Gloria; Lily readies herself for the school talent show; Haley suffers from appendicitis.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire takes on some cleaning during the break; Phil is upset that Luke is better than him at everything; Haley and Alex try to distract themselves by going to a music festival; Gloria and Jay challenge each other to give up their worst habits.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Patrick discovers that the rock he lives under is a sea turtle who overslept; when the elderly Old Man Jenkins disrupts business as usual at the Krusty Krab, Mr. Krabs is unable to figure out a way to kick him out of the restaurant.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out; Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral, Skye's long-lost Merpup cousin, to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The PAW Patrol take part in a big mer-race but must come to the rescue when Moby's cheating puts Puplantis in serious danger.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Humdinger disguises himself as a "Merdinger" to steal the purple pearl, the PAW Patrol must return it to Puplantis; after Moby swipes the Whale Patroller, and all the Pups' vehicles with it, the pups climb aboard sea creatures to chase it down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The Aqua Pups rescue Coral, Moby and McSquidly from a submarine before it crashes into a delicate reef; the Aqua Pups must save the Merpups' golden orb release when Moby lures a Giant Squid into Puplantis.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him; when Everest joins the PAW Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Ryder calls on every member of the PAW Patrol to stop a hi-tech kid inventor from demolishing Adventure Bay so she can build her own dream city in its place.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm system is set off and the PAW Patrol must rescue them; when Mayor Humdinger steals one of Ryder's early inventions, an aircraft, he must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The Paw Patrol searches for Julia, Julius and a flamingo when they go missing from a dance contest; the Paw Patrol comes to the rescue when Mayor Goodway and her niece Julia get stuck on a runaway art installation.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Mayor Humdinger's mom Helga loses her son's phony trophy, the PAW Patrol have to rescue her and its secret stash of treats; When Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta get trapped inside a mesa, it's up to the PAW Patrol & a little snake to rescue them.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The PAW Patrol must rescue Mr. Porter and reunite an ostrich family before the big birds get into big trouble; during Mayor Goodway's fashion show, the pups must save Farmer Al and Mayor Humdinger.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger steals a jukebox so he can play an annoying song all day long, so Chase and Rubble track it down in order to save the records; a hungry eagle causes Mayor Goodway's tightrope walking lesson to go awry.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When a mysterious storm drops hailstones that hatch into Baby Space Rocks, the Pups must find a way to keep them safe; a 3-D printer leads to trouble when Eddie and Emmy make 3-D reproductions of themselves and play pranks.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Rubble's cousin, Charger, visits Adventure Bay just in time to help out when a Humdinger-caused geyser destroys Mr. Porter's cafe; Mayor Humdinger hatches a plan to sabotage a Shiniest Ride Contest, so it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the day.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Emmy and Eddie take a joyride, Hurricane Harrigan and Captain Turbot get caught water skiing behind the out-of-control boat; Daring Danny X becomes Mayor Humdinger's assistant and builds a theme park; a jealous Humdinger sabotages the rides.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Goodway dreams she's travelled to Cluck-Cluck Island, a very strange land where Chickaletta is royalty; Travelling Travis's balloon gets caught on the Flounder, Travis and Cap'n Turbot wind up on a wayward airborne cruise into the desert.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: The Gal Pals, Karen Plankton, Sandy Cheeks, Mrs. Puff and Pearl Krabs, take Pearl to a secluded cabin in the woods for a weekend of some silly pranks.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward takes a trip inside the imagination box and must rely on SpongeBob and Patrick's creativity in order to escape.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When Snow Yellow is deemed the squarest of them all, the evil Queen Karen seeks to claim the title for herself by any means necessary.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When Bikini Bottom's atmosphere becomes too cold to be habitable for SpongeBob and his friends, the gang races to find a more suitable climate to live in while they still have time; the gang picks up their pace after Squidward freezes.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants has to find adoptive families for a litter of baby worms when his newly adopted worm has babies overnight; Plankton attempts to replace Karen when he gets tired of listening to her constant stream of criticisms.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Sandy makes an acorn-based food that people love, but her tree pays the price for greed; SpongeBob creates a community bulletin board inside the Krusty Krab, but reviews are posted on it anonymously which leads to trouble.

programme.title: Despicable Me 2
programme.desc: No longer worried about securing a place as the greatest thief in history, the criminal mastermind Gru is on his own raising the three orphaned girls but is soon recruited by an anti-villain league to help them hunt down a nefarious super-criminal.

programme.title: Despicable Me 2
programme.desc: No longer worried about securing a place as the greatest thief in history, the criminal mastermind Gru is on his own raising the three orphaned girls but is soon recruited by an anti-villain league to help them hunt down a nefarious super-criminal.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross, Chandler and Joey end up going on an adventurous road trip along with Gary in order to distract Ross from his thoughts of Emily; Emily leaves a message for Ross on his machine, but it accidentally gets erased from the tape.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe quickly regrets her decision to move in with Gary after he uses a gun to shoot down a flying bird; Ross and Joey become ultra-competitive while throwing a ball around; Rachel adopts a moody and hairless sphinx cat.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey is super excited about receiving an opportunity to participate in a film that is being produced in Las Vegas, but Chandler causes problems by expressing his doubts along the way; Phoebe is confusingly upset with Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The gang decides to surprise Joey in Las Vegas by coming to visit him; Chandler expresses jealous anger towards Monica when she neglects to warn him about a lunch with Richard; Joey meets someone with similar-looking hands.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica decides to leave her future up to the forces of fate when she rolls die to decide upon her response to Chandler's marriage proposal; Ross and Rachel surprise everyone by getting too drunk and ending up at the altar together.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross and Rachel wake up the morning after their impromptu marriage and regret the hasty circumstances of the ceremony; both Monica and Chandler find that neither of them really desires to rush their way to the wedding altar.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler decides to move in with Monica, causing confusion with Rachel and jealousy in Joey; Ross attempts to keep Rachel in the dark about the fact that he secretly neglected to have their impromptu marriage legally annulled.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Neither Monica nor Chandler can come to a decision about how to redecorate the room Rachel has vacated; Joey is looking for a roommate that is specifically attractive; Ross struggles to accept the fact that he still has feelings towards Rachel.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When Sheldon decides he would rather see a movie screening than spend the day with Amy, he pays Stuart to keep his girlfriend busy; Penny is determined to bond with Leonard's mother, Beverly, when she comes to town for a visit.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The arrival of Leonard's newly-divorced parents and Sheldon's religious mother results in mayhem; Wolowitz and Koothrappali are convinced that the government is deliberately causing them problems after they are approached about their guidance system.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: In the aftermath of Sheldon's mother having an intimate evening with Leonard's father, the gang is left to deal with an uncomfortable morning the next day; Penny's anxious mother and drug dealing brother come to town for the wedding.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard and the guys agree to meet with an Air Force colonel to discuss the creation of a guidance system, but they are worried that Sheldon's behavior might hinder the result; Bernadette tries to figure out who told her coworkers about her pregnancy.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey learns that he has lost the health insurance that he had as a working Hollywood actor; Rachel discovers that Ross never annulled their marriage after the two of them decide to move in with each other; Phoebe believes she is about to die.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey pretends that he owns a luxurious automobile after finding the keys to it; Rachel and Ross deal with the legal proceedings of a divorce; Chandler, Monica and Phoebe end up taking care of the triplets.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: As Jay's birthday approaches, Phil is excited to gift him a fancy outdoor grill; Claire and Mitch tell Jay they will return the money he loaned them, but aren't prepared when he agrees; Andy feels uncomfortable when Haley brings someone to the party.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: After Jay agrees to take over for Cam during his bowling finals, he discovers the team is an all-gay league, which makes him feel uncomfortable; Phil and Claire have a nice dinner with their neighbors; Gloria and Mitch go clubbing with Haley.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil and Jay pick up Lily's old princess castle for Joe, but Phil is annoyed that Claire won't let him get a video game console, while Jay thinks Joe is playing with too many girl toys; Gloria gives Haley pointers for standing up for herself at work.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Alex is horrified when both she and her biggest rival, Sunjay, are named Valedictorian, but their parents get the principal to hold a tie breaker with a gym grade they both failed; Gloria is distracted from preparing for her U.S. citizenship test.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil, Luke and Haley make Alex participate in her senior ditch day; Claire gets an offer to work for a big hotel chain, but is unsure what to do; and, as Manny recovers from a wisdom tooth extraction, Gloria schemes to break him and his new flame up.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The family gathers to celebrate Alex's graduation, minus Phil, who, after getting stuck in Seattle, has found a way to attend using Skype and a robot; Claire tries to find a great gift for Alex; Mitch keeps the news that he was laid off a secret.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Haley tries to stop Andy from proposing to Beth, which forces herself and Andy to come to terms with their real emotions; Phil and Claire try to help Haley and Andy, but they only complicate matters; Cam attempts to get Mitch to return to work.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick head to the movie theater to watch the latest horror film, but they soon believe they are being followed by the villain in the movie; SpongeBob wants to learn the recipe for a long-lost sandwich and holds a séance for help.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: After Chickaletta accidentally takes flight on a toy airplane, it's up to the team to rescue her; Mayor Humdinger mistakes a sloth for a monkey, racing to find it and cover up his blunder.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Tracker stumbles into a hidden jungle and its animal inhabitants are frightened by the rumblings of an impending volcano, so it's up to Ryder and the pups to use their new animal vehicles to rescue the creatures from the hot lava and save their home.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When the hidden jungle animals appear to be uncharacteristically frightened, Marshall discovers that a sabretooth tiger has been stalking them and the big-fanged tiger is not the only creature strangely awakening from long, long ago.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Arrby recruits a crew of Meerkats to gather magical seeds, so it's up to the Pups to recover the seeds and rescue Arrby and crew; Mayor Humdinger wants a hippo as his new hench-animal but needs a rescue when it gallops off with Humdinger on his back.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The pups rescue Sweetie when she sneaks into the hidden jungle and finds a mysterious orb which causes everything she touches to turn to gold; the Pups must save a colony of giant ants from destroying the hidden jungle and themselves.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When a windstorm sends a polar bear cub down to Adventure Bay, it's up to Ryder, Everest and the pups to bring the baby bear back to its family; the Pups must save Mayor Humdinger from a runaway movie projector at the new drive-in.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The PAW Patrol must save the day when two overly helpful robots take on more than they can handle; in a dream, Mayor Humdinger finds a prism that makes rainbows & drains Adventure Bay of color, so the pups must restore color to Adventure Bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The PAW Patrol springs into action when a digging machine goes out-of-control and takes Uncle Otis on a wild ride; Digi and Tal try to help Mayor Humdinger but leave the Mayor covered in jam, the Pups must rescue him from hungry animals.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Liberty comes to visit the PAW Patrol pups just in time to help save the Turbots and their doppler radar in a daring mountain rescue; when Farmer Al builds a windmill, the wind takes Farmer Yumi and Garby on a wild flight.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Digi and Tal's space vacuum breaks it's up to the pups to save Mayor Humdinger from falling space debris; when Humdinger's cuckoo clock goes out of control, Ryder and the pups must rescue Travis and get control of the cuckoo to save Humdinger.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger's birthday party goes horribly awry when Marshall Kitty gets trapped inside a life-sized piñata; Mayor Humdinger tries pushing fog into Adventure Bay, it's up to the Paw Patrol to find animals missing in the clouds and save the day.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Charger helps the Paw Patrol rescue Santa Claus and his helpers when a blizzard at the North Pole threatens to close Christmas.; Mayor Humdinger enlists Digi & Tal to help him win a hockey game, it's up to the pups to undo the mayhem the team causes.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When a baby caribou winds up speeding down a mountainside, it's up to the PAW Patrol to save the calf and reunite him with his family; when Luke Stars gets blown away in a giant tumbleweed, Digi and Tal make a duplicate which dances out of control.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Cap'n Turbot's ship disappears, the Paw Patrol must venture into the mysterious Adventure Bay Triangle to find the missing vessel; when Alex and Mr. Porter swap roles, the pups must help track down the mini-patrol after they go missing.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: While trying to save Traveling Travis, Ryder and the pups stumble across the legendary Elephants Spa; Uncle Otis believes he's found gold but when Sid the Pirate tries to jump on Otis's claim, Otis gets trapped in a sunken shipping container.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Liberty and the Poms team up with the Mighty Pups to save Adventure Bay from being crushed by a giant, flying Top Hat.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: While at Kamp Koral for a reunion, SpongeBob SquarePants and the gang are stalked by a mysterious figure, who is lurking in the shadows, as campers start disappearing one by one.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: While wringing himself off after showering, SpongeBob accidentally gets stuck in his wringer and is forced to spend the rest of the day in the contraption.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: In an attempt to make an impression on an old rival from his time in high school Squidward comes up with the idea to form a marching band and needs to recruit Sponge Bob and some other members to join the band and play with him.

programme.title: Despicable Me 2
programme.desc: No longer worried about securing a place as the greatest thief in history, the criminal mastermind Gru is on his own raising the three orphaned girls but is soon recruited by an anti-villain league to help them hunt down a nefarious super-criminal.
